abstract: Cybersecurity activist unveils new list of 26,382 Twitter accounts that are said to be linked to Islamic State; list, however, has erroneous listings.
lead_paragraph: The new list was meant to expose the Islamic State’s exploitation of Twitter, but it misidentified some accounts as suspect.

headline.main: Activist Links More Than 26,000 Twitter Accounts to ISIS
headline.print_headline: Activist Links Islamic State to 26,000 on Twitter

snippet: The new list was meant to expose the Islamic State’s exploitation of Twitter, but it misidentified some accounts as suspect.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
